DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim study : To provide accurate reliable information regard NSCLC clinical management across MENA region order detect unmet medical need disease term : - Patient hospital characteristic . - Diagnostic treatment approach : initial subsequent . - Follow-up pattern clinical management . - Outcomes : symptom , death , functionality , quality life . - Use resource burden patient health care system .
